name: 汉字数独
description:
Chinese Sudoku- Pretty puzzling. An innovative Sudoku game.
Highlighted features:
- Each puzzle is original,which is set by professional sudoku players.
- Innovative look and feel
- 300+ beautiful puzzles

More features:
- Optional aids
- Undo
- Digit hightlighting
- Count of remaining digits

What to wait for:
- More Sudoku variants subjects

Enjoy.
